name: Pauli's Adventure Island
description:
Hop, dash, fly, and float your way through rolling hills, mysterious forests, dark caves, ancient temples, and more in this epic 2D side-scrolling platformer! Explore and collect all the stars in each level for extra lives, but beware of dangerous creatures: One false step, and you’ll get knocked back to square one!

Story
Pauli and Gemmi discover that their beloved island has been overrun by mechanical monsters determined to build an enormous, exclusive resort at the expense of everyone else. Now it’s up to Pauli and Gemmi to do something about these invaders … before it’s too late!

Gameplay
Play as Pauli or Gemmi in your quest to defeat the mechanical monsters. Following the classic platformer gameplay, you must guide our heroes to the end of each level. Every level contains three special clovers that are either well hidden or difficult to reach. Try to collect as many as possible! For the speedrunner in you, each level has a gold master time set. Demonstrate your skills by beating each level within this timelimit.

Controls & tips

  • Use the arrow keys to move left or right
  • Press A to jump, hold A to jump higher
  • Press B to attack
  • Press B in mid-air to do a double jump (and attack at the same time)
  • Hold A inside an updraft to fly (limited to a few levels)
  • Change the button layout in the configuration screen (accessible from Title Screen)

Features

  • Classic platformer: Dash through a 2D side-scrolling adventure platformer.
  • Choose your hero: Play as a bunny named Pauli or Gemmi.
  • Unique worlds: Explore 30+ levels across 4 stunning worlds.
  • Epic challenge: Battle enemies and avoid obstacles.
  • Achievements: Earn and unlock coveted achievements.
  • Precise controls: Customize in-game control settings.
